data.title: Chubb External
data.meta_description: Role Summary Support adoption of Agile processes and Agile ways of working in the organization Manages Team/Domain synchronization, process efficiency, and continuous improvement processes (can oversee up to 4+ Teams, eventually aligned to a domain) Coach the Digital Product Owner, Team members, and other individuals in effective Agile practices, lead and/or facilitate Scrum and/or other Agile practices, facilitating gradual team adoption and independence Responsibilities •Increase overall Agile maturity •Build new Teams and set up delivery processes (e.g., facilitate workshops, trainings, define cadences) •Nurture adherence to Agile, practices, and principles •Elevate Team performance •Teach, mentor, role-model, and improve Agile across the organization •Foster self-organization and growth within Teams and Domains •Facilitate communication and collaboration inside and outside of Teams and Domains •Encourage the Teams to drive to results by routinely assessing ac...
